name: Escape (itch) (tea_mori)
description:
Inspired by the content of the CallMeKevin cinematic universe. Attempt to escape as you play as a prisoner in Jim's basement. This is my first fully independently developed game so it's not perfect, but I hope CallMeKevin fans can enjoy nonetheless.  If you have any questions, concerns or confusions please comment them below. 

Controls:

Walk........................................W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys

Run.........................................Shift

Look Around.............................Mouse

Jump.......................................Space

Interact................................... E

Pick Up....................................Left Mouse Button

Attack.....................................Right Mouse Button

Exit Game...............................Esc
